r.d: Allow one to use htaccess-like file to configure PHP per directory, just like apache's htaccess. It is especially useful with fastcgi. This package was originally developed by Bart Vanbrabant. Old versions are available from: http://files.zoeloelip.be/htscanner
r.n: - Removed invalid zend_hash_destroy in mshutdown - Added an error message when no path translated has been found - Unlock the cache when an error occured in alter_ini and using a cached entry
